statements: SELECT donor_name, donated_item FROM donations;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_date = '2022-10-01';
SELECT donor_email, recipient_name FROM donations WHERE donated_item = 'Cash';
SELECT recipient_name, donor_name, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT donor_name FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donated_item FROM donations WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY donor_name HAVING total_donations > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT donor_name FROM donations WHERE donated_item LIKE '%shoes%';
SELECT donor_name, recipient_name FROM donations ORDER BY donor_name, recipient_name;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT donation_item, donation_quantity FROM donations WHERE donation_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT donor_name, donation_quantity FROM donors INNER JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donation_date < '2021-10-01';
SELECT donor_name, donation_item, distribution_status FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id ORDER BY donation_quantity DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donation_item, donation_quantity, donation_date FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id;
SELECT donor_name, donation_quantity, donation_date FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donation_quantity > 5;
SELECT donor_name, donation_item, donation_date FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE distribution_status = True;
SELECT donor_name, donation_quantity, donation_date FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id ORDER BY donation_quantity DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donors;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM DonatedItems WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donors ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT recipient_name, recipient_address, item_name FROM Distribution WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM DonatedItems WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT recipient_name, recipient_address FROM Distribution WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY recipient_name;
SELECT donation_amount, donor_name FROM Donors JOIN DonatedItems ON Donors.donor_id = DonatedItems.donor_id WHERE item_id = 2 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description, donor_name FROM DonatedItems JOIN Donors ON DonatedItems.donor_id = Donors.donor_id ORDER BY donor_name, item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM donated_items ORDER BY item_quantity DESC;
SELECT donation_id, donor_id, item_id, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_id = 3;
SELECT distribution_id, item_id, recipient_name FROM distribution WHERE distribution_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 500
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_quantity FROM donated_items WHERE item_category = 'Clothing'
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donations.donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT item_name, recipient_name, distribution_date FROM donated_items JOIN distribution ON donated_items.item_id = distribution.item_id WHERE distribution_date < '2022-09-01'
SELECT DISTINCT donation_id, donor_id, item_id FROM donations ORDER BY donor_id DESC, donation_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Donors;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM Donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM DonatedItems WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT donor_name, item_name, donation_date FROM Donors JOIN Donations ON Donors.donor_id = Donations.donor_id JOIN DonatedItems ON Donations.item_id = DonatedItems.item_id;
SELECT recipient_id, recipient_name, location FROM Recipients WHERE location = 'City';
SELECT * FROM Donors ORDER BY donation_date DESC, donor_name ASC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM Donations JOIN Donors ON Donors.donor_id = Donations.donor_id WHERE donation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM DonatedItems WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name ASC;

SELECT Donors.donor_name, Recipients.recipient_name, Distribution.quantity_received FROM Donations JOIN Donors ON Donors.donor_id = Donations.donor_id JOIN Distribution ON Distribution.donation_id = Donations.donation_id JOIN Recipients ON Recipients.recipient_id = Distribution.recipient_id WHERE donor_name LIKE '%Alice%' AND recipient_name = 'Bob';

SELECT Donors.donor_name, COUNT(DonnatedItems.item_id) AS total_items_donated FROM Donors JOIN Donations ON Donations.donor_id = Donors.donor_id JOIN DonatedItems ON DonatedItems.item_id = Donations.item_id GROUP BY donor_name ORDER BY total_items_donated DESC,donor_name ASC;
